summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Bizupy GST Bill & Business Tracker. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend flows working correctly with conditional GSTIN logic verified.

minor_issues.issue: Profile update API initially required email field
minor_issues.fix_applied: Created separate UserProfileUpdate model without required email field

integration_issues.impact: Minor - flow completes but may have validation issue

design_issues.issue: Missing aria-describedby attributes causing accessibility warnings

passed_tests: Authentication flow (send OTP, verify OTP, login)
Dashboard stats display with all metrics
Bill upload with OCR processing using OpenAI GPT-5.2
Bills list page with extracted data display
Customer CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Product CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Invoice creation with conditional GSTIN field (shows when quantity > 500)
Ledger page with transaction history table
Settings page with profile and business information update
Landing page with hero, features, and pricing sections
All backend API endpoints (25/25 tests passed)
